scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn run prep:mainnet; graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ knownorigin/known-origin
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn run prep:rinkeby; graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ knownorigin/known-origin-rinkeby
